effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

flavor_text.black_white: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. It may harshly lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. It may harshly lower the target’s Sp. Def.
